turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hickory Creek & Teasley, in Denton, TX

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Starbucks at 4910 Teasley Lane Denton, TX?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like--short, tall, grande, or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like--almond, coconut, nonfat milk, whole milk, 2% milk, or soy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream, or no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any additional flavors added, such as extra sugar, extra milk, honey, cinnamon, chocolate, or caramel?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like some chocolate syrup drizzled on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like a tall, caffe mocha with whole milk, whipped cream, and chocolate syrup on top? Please say Yes to confirm, or No to change this item.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any other drinks from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at 4910 Teasley Lane Denton, TX and will be ready for pickup shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
